column1: VR-001,L_ORDERKEY should never contain null values to maintain the relationship with the order table.,Check if L_ORDERKEY contains any null values.,Completeness,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_ORDERKEY IS NULL;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_ORDERKEY IS NULL;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_ORDERKEY'].isnull()]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-002,L_PARTKEY should never contain null values to ensure proper tracking of parts in the order.,Check if L_PARTKEY contains any null values.,Completeness,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_PARTKEY IS NULL;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_PARTKEY IS NULL;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_PARTKEY'].isnull()]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-003,L_SUPPKEY should never contain null values to maintain the relationship with the supplier table.,Check if L_SUPPKEY contains any null values.,Completeness,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_SUPPKEY IS NULL;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_SUPPKEY IS NULL;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_SUPPKEY'].isnull()]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: reference

VR-004,L_QUANTITY should never contain null values to ensure accurate order quantities.,Check if L_QUANTITY contains any null values.,Completeness,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_QUANTITY IS NULL;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_QUANTITY IS NULL;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_QUANTITY'].isnull()]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-005,L_EXTENDEDPRICE should never contain null values to ensure accurate order pricing.,Check if L_EXTENDEDPRICE contains any null values.,Completeness,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_EXTENDEDPRICE IS NULL;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_EXTENDEDPRICE IS NULL;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_EXTENDEDPRICE'].isnull()]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-006,L_DISCOUNT should not exceed 1.0 to maintain the validity of the discount.,Check if L_DISCOUNT is greater than or equal to 1.0.,Accuracy,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_DISCOUNT >= 1.0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_DISCOUNT >= 1.0;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_DISCOUNT'] >= 1.0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: supporting

VR-007,L_TAX should not exceed 1.0 to maintain the validity of the tax.,Check if L_TAX is greater than or equal to 1.0.,Accuracy,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_TAX >= 1.0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_TAX >= 1.0;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_TAX'] >= 1.0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-008,"L_RETURNFLAG should only contain valid values (A, R, or N).",Check if L_RETURNFLAG contains invalid values.,Accuracy,"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_RETURNFLAG NOT IN ('A', 'R', 'N');","SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_RETURNFLAG NOT IN ('A', 'R', 'N');","len(lineitem[~lineitem['L_RETURNFLAG'].isin(['A', 'R', 'N'])])","DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-009,L_LINESTATUS should only contain valid values (F or O).,Check if L_LINESTATUS contains invalid values.,Accuracy,"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_LINESTATUS NOT IN ('F', 'O');","SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_LINESTATUS NOT IN ('F', 'O');","len(lineitem[~lineitem['L_LINESTATUS'].isin(['F', 'O'])])","DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-010,L_QUANTITY and L_EXTENDEDPRICE should have a consistent relationship to ensure accurate order pricing.,Check if L_QUANTITY and L_EXTENDEDPRICE have inconsistent relationships.,Consistency,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_QUANTITY * L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_QUANTITY * L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,len(lineitem[(lineitem['L_QUANTITY'] * lineitem['L_EXTENDEDPRICE']) < 0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Consistency

VR-011,L_DISCOUNT and L_EXTENDEDPRICE should have a consistent relationship to ensure accurate order pricing.,Check if L_DISCOUNT and L_EXTENDEDPRICE have inconsistent relationships.,Consistency,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_DISCOUNT * L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_DISCOUNT * L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,len(lineitem[(lineitem['L_DISCOUNT'] * lineitem['L_EXTENDEDPRICE']) < 0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Consistency

VR-012,L_TAX and L_EXTENDEDPRICE should have a consistent relationship to ensure accurate order pricing.,Check if L_TAX and L_EXTENDEDPRICE have inconsistent relationships.,Consistency,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_TAX * L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_TAX * L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,len(lineitem[(lineitem['L_TAX'] * lineitem['L_EXTENDEDPRICE']) < 0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Consistency

VR-013,L_ORDERKEY should be unique to maintain the integrity of the order line items.,Check if L_ORDERKEY contains duplicate values.,Uniqueness,"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT L_ORDERKEY, COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM GROUP BY L_ORDERKEY HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) subquery;","SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT L_ORDERKEY, COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM GROUP BY L_ORDERKEY HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) subquery;",len(lineitem.drop_duplicates(['L_ORDERKEY'])[['L_ORDERKEY']].index),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-014,L_PARTKEY and L_SUPPKEY should be unique for each L_ORDERKEY to maintain the integrity of the order line items.,Check if the combination of L_PARTKEY and L_SUPPKEY is unique for each L_ORDERKEY.,Uniqueness,"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT L_ORDERKEY, L_PARTKEY, L_SUPPKEY, COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM GROUP BY L_ORDERKEY, L_PARTKEY, L_SUPPKEY HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) subquery;","SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT L_ORDERKEY, L_PARTKEY, L_SUPPKEY, COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM GROUP BY L_ORDERKEY, L_PARTKEY, L_SUPPKEY HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) subquery;","len(lineitem.drop_duplicates(['L_ORDERKEY', 'L_PARTKEY', 'L_SUPPKEY'])[['L_ORDERKEY', 'L_PARTKEY', 'L_SUPPKEY']].index)","DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-015,L_EXTENDEDPRICE should be positive to ensure accurate order pricing.,Check if L_EXTENDEDPRICE contains negative values.,Accuracy,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_EXTENDEDPRICE < 0;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_EXTENDEDPRICE'] < 0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness

VR-016,L_DISCOUNT should be non-negative to ensure accurate order pricing.,Check if L_DISCOUNT contains negative values.,Accuracy,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_DISCOUNT < 0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_DISCOUNT < 0;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_DISCOUNT'] < 0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: supporting

VR-017,L_TAX should be non-negative to ensure accurate order pricing.,Check if L_TAX contains negative values.,Accuracy,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_TAX < 0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_TAX < 0;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_TAX'] < 0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: supporting

VR-018,L_QUANTITY should be positive to ensure accurate order quantities.,Check if L_QUANTITY contains negative values.,Accuracy,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_QUANTITY < 0;,SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNOWFLAKE_SAMPLE_DATA.TPCH_SF1.LINEITEM WHERE L_QUANTITY < 0;,len(lineitem[lineitem['L_QUANTITY'] < 0]),"DAMA DMBOK 2nd Edition.pdf: Completeness
